a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Mumps containing Doses Administered to Patient

def.name: Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Mumps containing Doses Administered to Patient that are in the Primary series

def.name: Number of Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Number of Mumps Primary Series doses

a:s.a:s: "Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient"

source.name: Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered to Patient

def.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 12 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 12 months

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 12 months-42

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

def.name: No mumps primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No mumps primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No mumps primary series doses were administered-125

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

a:s.a:s: "Number of Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered

def.name: Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" ≥ 12 months

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months-42

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

def.name: Live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) < 4 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks-92

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

a:s.a:s: "Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

expression.name: Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: No live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Live vaccine" = TRUE) ≥ 4 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks-92

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

a:s.a:s: "No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

expression.name: No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: One mumps primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: One mumps primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: One mumps primary series dose was administered-125

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

a:s.a:s: "Number of Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Mumps Primary Series Doses Administered

a:t.name: internal
a:t.value: Date of Latest Mumps Dose

def.name: The latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines") < 4 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: The latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago-108

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

def.name: The latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date and time of vaccination" (where "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines") ≥ 4 weeks

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: The latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago-108

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)

a:s.a:s: "The latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

operand.name: The latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

a:t.value: Two mumps primary series doses were administered

a:t.name: pseudocode

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)
